text:
We have a lot of multitenant customers
live in the cloud.

Those customers are collecting
a lot of data and we wanted

to get more insights
for using the data to our customers

in terms of enterprise automation
predictions, optimizations,
automating a lot of tasks for end users

that makes customers 
be more effective in their daily job.

Infor is working a lot with the machine
learning.

Now we're working together
with the AWS on the Gen AI journey

and we started already working in
this summer in 2023.
Amazon Bedrock and Gen AI in

general is a huge opportunity for us
and for our customers.

We have our ERP data,
we have our data in a data

lake that provides all the data
for the end-to-end business solution.

And we have the machine learning
prediction and we have our documentation.
Our vision is to really bring that wisdom, that insights
as you go through a workflow
or you're looking your performance of the operations
and having gen AI with you
that tells you how you are doing, what you can do to improve
the business process, essentially.

With Amazon Bedrock, itâ€™s
very promising for us to use
that as, really, framework for Gen AI.

So we use SageMaker as our core
AI platform

and all orchestrations,
how to do the building of the model,

the training, providing the APIs
and surface that back to our end users

in their industry so that they can have
all those optimizations.

Before maybe, you could give
 you could get 80% of

you know, business operation
and operational optimization.

Now, because you have insights of the data,
you can get that 80%, 90%, and even 100%.

That next level optimization, that is
where the journey we are working on.
Building on AWS means that, for us,
we don't need to worry about the IT.

We just can focus
on the value of what we need to deliver

to our customers to provide, you know, end
to end business process solutions.
That to us, is very valuable.
